name: Capture of the Crown
description:
This is my first game in this genre! 

I made it on python, because I don't know anything else yet! Please do not heighten, but give advice!!!

 I took all the assets from this site! I want to know your opinion

In the second main.exe is the same, only a different arena! I do not know how to make a menu for this game and choose a hero/arena
